name: Portal Peril (ZacFierce)
description:
It's a destruction derby, but you have a trick up your sleeve! Drive carefully and use your teleport to cause other cars to crash. Go for a high score before you run out of health!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys or WASD to accelerate, decelerate, and turn
  • Left click to teleport when you see the hexagon (Be careful not to teleport out of the arena!)
  • F5 to restart

Created in 2 hours for Game-U LIVE. Watch the recording here!
